author: Gary Z
comment: Worst app ever.  Does not remove apps from the watch, I'm able to uninstall apps from my phone myself thank you very much.  Worse yet, uninstalling this app did not remove it from my watch.  I had to reinstall it and use it to remove itself, which got it off my app list but according to the Android wear app on my phone it's still there taking up memory.

author: Joe Kovacs
comment: I downloaded this because it sounded like you could remove apps from the watch , but in fact it completely removes the app from your phone, thereby removing it from the watch. That's not what I wanted. So if it can't remove apps then I don't see any remaining functionality that isn't already there, either on the watch or through Android Wear.
title: I don't see the point

author: Mark Haven
comment: This is garbage. It doesnt take the app off your android wear watch, it erases it from the PHONE! I wantes the apps on my phone, just not in my watch... fake app that in no way works with android wear

author: Brian S
comment: I got this as I was looking for a way to un-install a game that wouldn't run properly on my Moto360 and I couldn't even find - much less *uninstall* from my phone!  This installed in a flash, and let me kill off the problemmatic game by running it on my phone.  Voila - no more problem!  Thanks!!
title: Just installed it - looks good so far!

author: j3rf
comment: Installed looking for the ability to uninstall Android Wear app versions from my watch, but in fact just completely removes the apps from my phone as well. Need to revise description of app to stop misleading people.

author: Tatianna Kern
comment: I just want specific apps off the watch... and to stay on my phone. It just deletes/adds them to both. Not useful.
title: Does not distinguish between phone

author: Luis Deriel
comment: This apps does what it is supposed to do and that's good enough for me. It would be nice to have the option to hide/show apps on your smart watch, but that's just me being being picky. Thank you!
title: Its good!

author: David Maloney
comment: This makes it easy to remove user installed apps from your andoid wear.  Works great on my ansus 2.  Make sure the app is both on phone and on watch for it to work right.
title: Love this

author: Craig Spreha
comment: It just uninstalled the apps from my phone, not my Wear watch. Waste of effort.
title: Waste of time and space

author: Justin G
comment: Hopefully an update is coming soon because it won't uninstall google music or Amazon store from my watch after the lollipop update.
title: Good ui

author: Ian Grody
comment: Now i can tell for sure that the wear app did uninstall and reinstall. Can never be too sure otherwise as some wear apps dont leave an icon in the menu.

author: Jonathan Fuller
comment: Doesnt do anything on the wear itself,  which includes the app that supposedly gets installed on the wear

reply.author: Wearable Software
reply.content: Of course. There is a app on wear with settings for the app tracker. With the app tracker you get a hint if a new app is installed, updated or deleted on wear device. Please review again. Thanks.

title: Bad

author: Vishnu Anilkumar
comment: Would like a task manager for the watch so that I can see which is using more memory and kill it if necessary
title: Helpful app

author: Michael Stebbings
comment: I have been using this for a few days and had no problems with it. Easy way to uninstall apps on your watch and find out if there are app settings on the phone that can be changed.
title: Great app so far

author: Rob Simpson
comment: Pointless app. Wanted to remove apps from Moto360 which annoyingly pop up ALL the time - thought this app would do it but all it does is delete the app from my mobile - well I could easily have done that myself. Android wear is pretty terrible so annoying with pop ups all the time & no way to stop them without deleting wanted apps.

author: Ben Turner
comment: Doesn't do anything you can't already do. It doesn't remove them from the watch without deleting the entire app from the phone which you can do from play store or settings. Useless and misleading!

author: Richard Cowin
comment: Removes apps from both phone and watch. Not what I wanted. What's the point? Misleading.

author: Elwin Marlatt
comment: Freezes in lolly pop with install deletes and updates turned on
title: nice app but

author: JAYESHKUMAR BHATT
comment: This app do not delete base app of Moto 360...& That's limitation
title: App

author: Nat Lawrence
comment: It doesn't delete apps on watch. It deletes them on your PHONE. Pointless.
title: So misleading! Hate.

author: Web DesignInc
comment: It works flawlessly (LG Urbane + HTC ONE m7, m8)
title: Does what it says

author: Ken Webster
comment: Not able to uninstall apps just on the watch anymore.

author: Ryan Savage
comment: Aka stupid
title: Just removes apps from your phone

author: Daniel Burke
comment: Did what I needed. Let me remove apps still on my watch even though I uninstalled them from my phone some time ago.

author: Justin C
comment: I want the app on my phone, not the watch.  This just removes it from the phone.
title: Just uninstalls app from phone

author: Cosmin Popa
comment: Misleading  -  It removes the app completely from the phone

author: gary lee
comment: easiler to manager the app from my watch.
title: great app

author: Salman Qureshi
comment: Helpful to select the right app for you
title: Mumtaz

author: ae fette
comment: Removed the app from my phone, but NOT my watch 😡

author: Abarajithan Lv
comment: to get rid of my debugged watchface! 😑
title: This helped...

author: Roger James Thornton Brown
comment: Can't think why this isn't baked into the official Wear app.
title: Does what it says on the tin

author: Kris Oliver
comment: Does exactly what it said.  Easy to use.

author: Francisco Boucher
comment: Makes it easy to manage my android wear apps.
title: All my apps in 1 place

author: Will Walker
comment: I'm waiting in testing faze

author: Marshall Gray
comment: Love having all the wear apps in one location.
title: Great App

author: Gee Bee
comment: That's why it's called an app manager not anything else.does as it says.
title: Duh

author: Keith Holmes
comment: Worthy of the 5 star rating!! And it's FREE
title: I give it a 5

author: Dinico Win
comment: Aesthetics are everything...
title: Materialize the ui...
